message:
A nice recognition of several open source projects in the .NET world. Maintained by @JonGalloway and initiated by @SHanselman.

This is the discussion in which I believe this idea was born:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w6t0hP5wgPQ
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Open Source : The Official Microsoft ASP.NET Site
caption: asp.net
description: Microsoft continues its commitment to open source . We not only host projects at the CodePlex forge and support many open source projects, but we also create our own open-source projects that the c...
